comments: Preface the series with a 1: (1, 1, 3, 6, 18, 36,...); then the next term in the series = (1, 1, 3, 6,...) dot (1, 2, 1, 2,...). Example: 36 = (1, 1, 3, 6, 18) dot (1, 2, 1, 2, 1) = (1 + 2 + 3 + 12 + 18). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 18 2009Partial products of A176059. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 04 2012]
